channel.title: Announcing a 200m in XP

item.title: Announcing a 200m in XP
item.dc:creator: @MikeMike1997 MikeMike1997
item.description:
@MikeMike1997 wrote:

I am the only person who gets the message, whether it’s me getting the 200m or someone else. I seem to be the only one in the whole server who gets the message.

Hope that explained a little more

item.description:

if you get 200m do you see the message on your screen saying you got 200m?

if someone else gets 200m do you see the message on your screen saying you got 200m when you didnt?

if someone else gets 200m you dont see any message? do they?

item.title: Announcing a 200m in XP
item.dc:creator: @MikeMike1997 MikeMike1997
item.description:
@MikeMike1997 wrote:

When the person hits 200m XP it only send it to me? Even if it’s someone else. I have the other part of the code in skills if needed.

	public static void send200m(Player player, int skill) {
		for (Player players : World.getPlayers()) {
				players.getPackets().sendGameMessage(
					"<img=6><col=ff8c38>News: " + player.getDisplayName()
							+ " has achieved " + "200m experience in" + " "
							+ Skills.SKILL_NAME[skill] + ".", false);
			return;
	}
}

Read full topic
